name: Sumeru: The Gilded Desert - Series I

achievements.name: Continental Explorer: Dune Dreams (I)
achievements.desc: Light up the maps of the following areas in Sumeru: Hypostyle Desert, Land of Upper Setekh, and Land of Lower Setekh.

achievements.name: Over Sandstorms and Mirages (I)
achievements.desc: Unlock all Teleport Waypoints in the following areas in Sumeru: Hypostyle Desert, Land of Upper Setekh, and Land of Lower Setekh.

achievements.name: Sanctuary Pilgrim: Dune Dreams (I)
achievements.desc: Unlock all the Shrines of Depths in the following areas in Sumeru: Hypostyle Desert, Land of Upper Setekh, and Land of Lower Setekh.

achievements.name: The Desert Will Guide You Home (I)
achievements.desc: Follow 10 Seelie to their Seelie Courts in Hypostyle Desert, Land of Upper Setekh, and Land of Lower Setekh.

achievements.name: The Desert Will Guide You Home (I)
achievements.desc: Follow 20 Seelie to their Seelie Courts in Hypostyle Desert, Land of Upper Setekh, and Land of Lower Setekh.

achievements.name: The Desert Will Guide You Home (I)
achievements.desc: Follow 40 Seelie to their Seelie Courts in Hypostyle Desert, Land of Upper Setekh, and Land of Lower Setekh.

achievements.name: Quicksand Treasure Hunter (I)
achievements.desc: Open a total of 60 treasure chests in Hypostyle Desert, Land of Upper Setekh, and Land of Lower Setekh.

achievements.name: Quicksand Treasure Hunter (I)
achievements.desc: Open a total of 120 treasure chests in Hypostyle Desert, Land of Upper Setekh, and Land of Lower Setekh.

achievements.name: Quicksand Treasure Hunter (I)
achievements.desc: Open a total of 240 treasure chests in Hypostyle Desert, Land of Upper Setekh, and Land of Lower Setekh.

achievements.name: Quicksand Adventurer (I)
achievements.desc: Complete a total of 10 Open World Time Trial Challenges in Hypostyle Desert, Land of Upper Setekh, and Land of Lower Setekh.

achievements.name: Quicksand Adventurer (I)
achievements.desc: Complete a total of 20 Open World Time Trial Challenges in Hypostyle Desert, Land of Upper Setekh, and Land of Lower Setekh.

achievements.name: Quicksand Adventurer (I)
achievements.desc: Complete a total of 40 Open World Time Trial Challenges in Hypostyle Desert, Land of Upper Setekh, and Land of Lower Setekh.
